Bh fitness

BH Fitness aims daily to design, manufacture and market the best equipment that contributes to well-being and the improvement of the quality of life, therefore, it wants to reach as many users as possible. In this sense, BH has different business units: BH BIKES, BH HOME FITNESS and BH HEALTH AND BEAUTY.
